Ruby.en: Sharp pins are fired to strike 2 to 5 times.

Sapphire.en: Sharp pins are fired to strike 2 to 5 times.

Emerald.en: Sharp pins are fired to strike 2 to 5 times.

FireRed.en: Sharp pins are shot at the foe and hit two to five times at once.

LeafGreen.en: Sharp pins are shot at the foe and hit two to five times at once.

Diamond.en: Sharp pins are shot at the foe in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

Pearl.en: Sharp pins are shot at the foe in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

Platinum.en: Sharp pins are shot at the foe in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

SoulSilver.en: Sharp pins are shot at the foe in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

Black.en: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.
Black.de: Spitze Nadeln treffen das Ziel 2- bis 5-mal hintereinander.
